'''1.3.11''' is a minor update to the [[launcher]] released on March 12, 2014.

== Changes ==
* Update Notes website frame uses JavaFX if available
* Profiles are now displayed in alphabetical order

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.3.11|project=MCL
|100|Launcher displays a malformed page when Tumblr is down
|226|Launcher waits before the webpage is loaded before becoming usable
|243|Launcher not showing update notes / showing garbage
|1917|Launcher downloads pre-releases as releases instead of snapshots
|2237|Profiles not organized in the Launcher
}}
